Build another one in Daphne.

name: James Stabler
text: My all time fast-food favorite!  Chick-fi-A has done their homework and scored an A+ at what they do!  Superior service and TEAM!  Fast....every single time.... efficient!!!!  What to be a successful business owner who serves the public....take a few pages out of Chick-fi-A's play book!

name: Doll Rabbeitt
text: I love the mac and cheese with my chicken  sandwich. The young adults are so pleasant and cheerful. They do such a good job.

name: Keith Polovich
text: I like the spicy chicken patty on a breakfast biscuit. I like my breakfast to bite back. It's not on the breakfast menu, but they made it for me anyway. I appreciated that.

name: Tim Cosby
text: Gave is spicy sandwiches instead of regular that we ordered. Wasn't going back thru a 20 minute drive thru to correct. They were nasty..

name: Dani Chapman
text: One of the best Chick-fil-A to eat at!!!

name: Kristin Phillips
text: My service was decent until the cashier handed me a bag with dirty nails. Pure dirt and filth underneath! I spoke to Michael. A manager in which he didn't seem concerned nor offered a refund for the meal I refused to eat.

name: King Champion Entrepreneur Ratheal
text: Fast and friendly,  I like this location!

name: George Cagle
text: Busy but good. Drive through only.

name: Kathleen Dillard
text: Mobile orders aren't always right. Drive through is fast and officiant

name: Cody Taylor
text: The southwest chicken salad with the creamy salsa is the best salad I've ever had. They also have a very quick drive thru and A+ manners.

name: Kayla Brown
text: Fast service, friendly employees and do what they can to make your food exactly how you want it.

name: Susan Norrell
text: Always delicious! Always friendly! Always good quality food! I love that I can order from my app, and someone will walk my order to my car! :)

name: B Gonz
text: Never fails to complete orders right. Just a little longer to wait but it's normal around lunch time

name: JERRY BRYANT
text: Great service, clean and excellent food.

name: Rebecca Middleton
text: CFA is great as always! Swamped with customers, but getting people in and out very quickly. I don't know what they do, but they do it right. I'm always happy to be a Chick-fil-A customer!

name: Bubba Mchan
text: Parking and drive through is a cluster, especially the merge.

name: Richard Jong
text: Taking social distancing and cleanliness to the next level. Credit card machines on a stick.

name: Stacy Mosley.
text: I've given this location chance after chance. I keep getting a burnt bagel and crumbled hashbrowns. Please get it together this is my favorite meal for breakfast.

name: Kyle o
text: My chicken nuggets don’t have any breading on them🤦🏼🤦🏼

name: kris franklin
text: I pulled into the drive thru at 145 and had my order by 130. Efficiency with a smile has never been this fast.

name: Lynn Drake
text: I sat in my car in line for over 20 minutes at 10:15 this morning.  I bought minis and the bread tasted like it may have been fresh yesterday and the meat inside was teeny tiny.  Where's the chicken?

name: Billy Lawson (Windshield)
text: Quick service for so many people.

name: mazie ikner
text: Great food great service

name: Lawrencia Ratcliff
text: They are always very nice even with the line wrapped around the building

name: Emily Nixon
text: I love CFA & have only had a handful of bad experiences. But today, i sat in the curbside pickup area for 20 minutes waiting on my food (which was only two bowls). I got the notification saying the food was ready. And continued to sit and wait. I had an appointment, so I no longer had the time to wait. I called the restaurant & asked them what was going on & the girl on the phone told me it would be out shortly... it wasn’t. I called again and just asked her to cancel it because I had to go to my appointment. She told someone in the background to take it to me. And I told her I was already on the way out and she just hung up on me mid-sentence. Like I said, I love CFA & usually service is great. But the girl on the phone was so rude today and they seemed the need a couple more employees.

name: Charlie Dantin
text: First time I got a salad there it wasn't made like they make the salads at chick fil a innspanish fort by the mall other than that it was ok an i wasnt given the salad dressing i asked for

name: Court Lane
text: I have NEVER had a bad experience until tonight! The lady at the window gave me a bag and I watched her take the bag back from the car in front. After asking for a new order she became rude. I even told her I ordered the whole entire meal but was only given the sandwich and lemonade. As much as I love Chick-fil-A this will be my absolute last time buying or supporting them.

name: Mike Hathorne
text: Super service even though it's  drive thru. Pelham Parkway  location  had 10 outside servers.... wow

name: Brandy Stephens
text: Chick-fil-A is THE best fast food period!

name: Todd Smith
text: Absolute angels out in the South Alabama heat helping ne indulge my fried chicken sandwich fantasies. The dizzying loops around the store to get in line for the drive thru can throw you off but once you get your fried delights, all is mended. Roll Tide and keep your distance out there!

name: Chris Durden
text: Always great, price, product and service with a smile 😋

name: Stephen Miller
text: Always good food and excelent service.

name: Jennifer L
text: Love Chick-fil-a. But on a Friday night... doing ONLY drive thru. No inside dining or curbside pickup, even for app orders. Pretty ridiculous, when the line of cars wraps around the building almost 3 times. Disappointed with management. 3 stars at least for good food.

name: Beth Stovall
text: Always friendly and line goes fast

name: Sean Wojtowicz
text: The absolute gold standard for a quick service restaurant.

name: Elizabeth Franklin
text: It's Chic Fila. polite and happy and good food

name: Georgette Riley
text: Always fast and courteous.

name: Sound Buryer Music
text: Didn't like the fact that I couldn't see the menu board until after I ordered, but my order was 100% correct even with the changes I made. Friendly staff as always

name: Rick Spurgeon
text: Great food and service as always!

name: Gary Knutson
text: Always a pleasant dining  experience at this location.  Super friendly staff, hot food and clean well maintained and managed restaurant.  Restrooms are clean and well stocked. The flowers in bud vases really a wonderful touch.

name: Carson Cotton
text: I order from here at least once a week but if you’re in a rush keep on driving lol

name: Jules Carter
text: Awesome food!

name: Angela Owens
text: Great food and service!

name: Frances Rushing
text: chicken. very cows. yummyness is 100.21%

name: Q Jennings
text: Won’t be back. They mess up my order/forget a whole meal EVERY TIME! Going to Spanish Fort for now on! Mat as well since I have to waste gas coming back here every time they forget something.

name: Jason Hunt
text: I love their chicken nuggets 😍 and Peach Shake. My go-to fast food everywhere I go.

name: Tim Ikner
text: In my opinion they have done a great job working to get everyone Service as quickly as they can during covid, and the food is always consistent

name: Kimeko Campbell
text: Best fast food buissnes all around

name: Darrell Davidson
text: Always awesome service, consistent quality and great value.

name: Bill Holmes
text: Great the chicken 🐔 👌

name: Jo Ann Gaiters
text: Service was fast, friendly and efficient. Delicious as usual.

name: Sandi Cushway
text: Love their breakfast and their sweet tea is GREAT!  The chicken nuggets on the breakfast menu are consistently over salted in my opinion.  (and I like salt on my food...so this was REALLY salty).

name: Misty Rudolph
text: The place has improved 🎉🎉🎊🎊👍👍👍👍

name: angela ragsdale
text: This is a very nice family restaurant! The drive thru is very well organized! We ordered lunch during the breakfast hours and they were happy to oblige! Very friendly! Very clean!

name: Butch Foster
text: Very good fast food

name: Kristen M
text: I usually go to chick-fil-a weekly, but this is the worst one I've been to. I ordered curbside, and I waited for nearly 30 minutes as I watched cars go by in the drive-thru. Once my food came, I did not have a straw, fork, napkins, or sauce. Disappointed.

name: Eric Turrentine
text: Very busy at all ours but it's incredible watching how efficient they are with all of the traffic.

name: Jeff Gardner
text: Like other locations, it is clean and well-maintained, and their staff is professional and still welcoming and friendly.  They assisted those in our party who are disabled, and the older patrons with a smile.  Plus, the Grilled Chicken Nuggets were done perfectly, and delicious.

name: Santyonia Bradley
text: Love their nuggets 😍

name: Tonya Floyd
text: Perfect, and delicious as always. Orders were perfect, zero mistakes. Fresh food. Fresh lettuce on the sandwiches. The employees are ALWAYS at one hundred percent...... efficient, and polite, and absolutely everyone always has a big beautiful smile on their faces. An impeccable fast food restaurant. 🤗

name: KALIE SWISHER
text: Customer Service is top notch at this location. Eric was such a delight in taking care of my order today. Would highly recommend this location to anyone.

name: Sheri Denk
text: Always great food and great service, the line might be long but definitely worth the wait

name: Jasma Dortch
text: Never been to another fast food restaurant with a better staff nor a higher quality food selection. The staff goes beyond their duty to ensure you have guaranteed satisfaction. The food is always fresh!

name: Rob Malone
text: Tried the Chik-fil-a app for the first time and it is the way to go. Like they say, there's an app for everything and this one is awesome.

name: Tommy Rhea
text: Too crowded waits too long

name: Dave and Deb B.
text: Love this place. So organized during this pandemic.

name: Anna James
text: Gave me someone else’s order

name: Brandy Morrison
text: Person working drive thru was busy talking to coworker.  Didn't bother to apologize for delay.

name: Veronica Heads
text: Very quick and friendly

name: Jasma Dortch
text: Never been to another fast food restaurant with a better staff nor a higher quality food selection. The staff goes beyond their duty to ensure you have guaranteed satisfaction. The food is always fresh!

name: Sheri Denk
text: Always great food and great service, the line might be long but definitely worth the wait

name: Tommy Rhea
text: Too crowded waits too long

name: KALIE SWISHER
text: Customer Service is top notch at this location. Eric was such a delight in taking care of my order today. Would highly recommend this location to anyone.

name: ゼロチャンZero
text: Management is horrible, treat workers pretty poorly. They don't know what they are doing most of time.

name: Baldwin County Youth Orchestra
text: Always good service

name: Rachael Hendrickson
text: WORST Chick-fil-a I've ever been to.  The employees were RUDE and the girl who took our order rolled her eyes and sighed when I asked if we could scan our app before we paid.  The drive thru set up was super unorganized and they wouldn't even show us a menu when we asked.  Our family definitely won't be visiting this location again.

name: Alex Huntley
text: Always jam packed so that should tell you something.

name: Shea Schrepf
text: Order too a while, and I was scolded for not following proper pick-up protocol, despite I thought I was making it easier for them? Prefer other local Chick-fil-A locations.

name: Alex Huntley
text: Always jam packed so that should tell you something.

name: Savannah Byrd
text: The food always good but daphne chick fil a got some rude team members now ever since they reopened since COVID happened😑

name: Shea Schrepf
text: Order too a while, and I was scolded for not following proper pick-up protocol, despite I thought I was making it easier for them? Prefer other local Chick-fil-A locations.

name: Deborah Lawson
text: Its good

name: Bryanna Rice
text: Always amazing service! Was also nicely decorated for the holidays. 🎄

name: Marla Brewer
text: My first time at cow appreciation day. The food was great as always, and the staff did a wonderful job handling the large crowd. I was surprised by the large discount in our dinner price. My granddaughter loved dressing as a cow.

name: laine casallo
text: Very fresh and fast service !

name: P Tomas
text: Consistent from property to property. Great customer service. Good consistent product. I am always amazed at the fantastic attitude of the employees/team members. My big gripe with the restaurants is that they are too successful. No matter how hard they try, and I believe they do try their very best, the drive-through is always packed. They need to put in four lanes.

name: A_Desiree E
text: The most friendliest place! And the chicken,..the best!!!

name: Carol Taylor
text: Chick-fil-A in Daphne Alabama is always great! The service is fast and your order is correct. The people who work there are courteous and very helpful!

name: Lawrence Barry
text: Super clean place. Great service. The only issue was the FOOD! After returning our chicken (We each ordered the four piece meal), which was hard as a brick and looked as if had been under the heat lamp for several hours, we were promptly returned what were supposed to be "fresh" filets. Alas, they were just as tough and as old as the ones before.

name: Suzie Sheffield
text: Nice to take the grandchildren to play here When the weather's not cooperating. And a good place to eat and socialize.

name: Melanie Walters
text: It was new years day... Not crowded.. But the staff were not excited to work on a holiday..and the orders took longer than usual

name: mr G
text: It's chikfila!

name: Felicia Warren
text: Delicious grilled chic sandwich

name: I am the One and Only
text: Fast and friendly service! Food was hot and tasty as usual. Long line in drive through but not a long wait at all. My favorite Chick-fil-A on the eastern shore.

name: Tanner FitzPatrick
text: Always the best

name: Cheri Brackins
text: This location in Daphne is the slowest one I have ever been to.

name: Andres Valverde
text: Fast and great service

name: HN Stevens
text: Great place to get a quick meal. Friendly atmosphere with a family focus. Mr. Nance and his staff are always top notch. This place stays busy but the staff is always focused and always have a smile.

name: Deb Abbott
text:
Frustrating....so, I’m in the drive through, they’re not very busy...employees talking in a group not paying attention! A young man finally comes to my vehicle and I’m placing my order with him and he says, you mean you haven’t ordered.....duh.....he tells me I have to circle the building and place my order to another employee and then he can take my money......so, I drive around the building & there are 5 cars ahead of me...  seriously....didn’t even apologize.....
😔😔😔😔☹️☹️☹️

name: JILL MOSLEY
text: Placed a curbside order. Watched the line in the drive thru go around twice while I waited 20 mins for food. After waiting that long, I cancelled my order and left.

name: Ryan Moss
text: Quickest drive thru in the business, excellent food & customer service... But you knew that!

name: K. L.
text: The service and the food is AWESOME 👌just had lunch THERE TODAY☺️☺️

name: Alexander Kip Ehrenberg
text: Obviously amazing. Here’s the new epidemic menu

name: Luke Mitchell
text: They have a system down for the drive thru which great except if you don't know the menu by heart. Yes they have a little portable menu, but if they are going to operate that way they should move menu boards earlier in line. I ordered a meal and never got my fries, also make sure you remember to ask for any sauce as they do not remind you at the window.

name: Joshua Herron
text: Always fantastic.

name: Patricia Kenny
text: Very friendly and excited workers providing fast and excellent service. Great food too!

name: B C
text: Drive thru layout is impressive and efficient.

name: Crystal Clark
text: Always Great

name: Davis Martin
text: Chicken was good af

name: Isaac Graham
text: Fast service and quality food. The workers are very friendly and accommodating. The lines are usually not too long but even when they are, it moves pretty quickly. When I ordered my 2 meals and a sandwich, my food was ready in less than 5 minutes. I was very impressed by how quickly I was served. The chicken sandwiches and waffle fries were delicious as usual. It's always a pleasant experience.

name: Ms. Anderson
text: Is there such a thing as a bad chick fil a lol I think not

name: Annie Hickey
text: They have a really terrific sausage biscuit!

name: Kaska Howard
text: Cold biscuits! Who in the world serves cold biscuits???

name: Walter “Roy” Edwards
text: Good food as expected exceptionally good service.  However, had to ask for Chic sauce .

name: Lauren M.
text: I asked for my chicken biscuit to be well done and they told me they don’t do that anymore. I hate when my skin is running off the chicken from lack of being cooked all the way if I saw where I could post a pic I would I don’t see what’s the problem about cooking somebody’s food well done when I’ve always got my chicken biscuit well done and this is the only chick fila I’ve ever had nuggets from that don’t taste or feel fresh and hot after you specifically asked for them to be dropped fresh

name: Christy Davis
text: Can never go wrong with the original chicken sandwich! I love extra pickles on mine!

name: Ginny Mitchell
text: I am a huge Chick-fil-A fan.  The food here is always hot and amazing.  Unfortunately, the last two times we have been here, we have spent 20+ minutes in line.  They try to mainstream the process by having various people take your order outside.  Unfortunately, it still goes slow when getting the food.

name: Brian R. Hampton
text: Always a great experience. Excellent customer service, fast food, hot food

name: Tim Allen
text: Food & Staff were great as usual & had unexpectedly run in to relatives at the restaurant.

name: Paul Romanick
text: Thank You for the 12 days of Christmas rewards. May you and all your employees have a very Blessed Christmas and 2020.

name: Robbie Miles
text: It good chicken

name: Lindsey Scott
text: Love this chick fil a!! They are always so friendly and efficient! I’ve never experienced a problem here! All the staff make you feel right at home and go out of their way to give a good experience! Keep up the great work, you guys are fantastic!!

name: EastCoast Stinnett
text: Review not needed. Always quick, extremely pleasant, and top notch. They are so good, I was annoyed on my last trip that they left off one of my 4 sauces (I always get an unnecessary amount of sauces). That's how on point they are always.

name: Scottie Swindle
text: I’m amazed at how quickly the drive through operates! Polite workers. I have never had a negative experience at Chick-fil-A!

name: Alaina Gray
text: Literally the worst chick fil a I’ve ever visited . My order is always wrong

name: Paul McLain
text: Food is always good but the drive thru is a challenge. Be prepared to wait. If there was more parking it would help.Better to go in.

name: Faraz Anjum
text: I really love daphne chick fill a, I go there a lot more than couple of times a week. There is someone is really rude I reported her one time seem like, after that it has gotten worse since I reported. so I was in line and was the  next person to place my order she was watching me in line and not call me to take my order, other cashier was taking someone else order and when other cashier called me to take my order she called the person who was behind me and took that persons order I did not really care if she called me or not to take my order but after that my next visit I had a pick up inside chick fill a and she is the one who handed me my order, the way she handed me my order was really rude, I can’t really describe in Writhing, I hope someone else takes my order next time I am there if not I think I am gonna be going to Spanish fort chick fill a.

name: zach tolleson
text: Chick fil a does fast food right. The people working there are always friendly and make the customer experience, the food is always hot and there is never a wait for your food. While the menu is limited, they have perfected chicken whether fried or grilled.

name: Randy Lawson
text: Always the best

name: Cynthia Cribbs
text: Awesome 😎

name: Heather R. Houston
text: Fantastic as always!!!  Service & Food Excellent!

name: Sam Shorrosh
text: Always packed, always superior service, very clean, friendly staff, excellent food.

name: Brad Johnson
text: There really should be more places like this! The workers actually put in the effort to make it the best experience possible and the quality of food is some of the best fast food available. Also the playground is a nice bonus if you have kids and the ice cream cone coupons and gift cards are great to give and receive. Also the condiments are the best.

name: Jean Jenkins
text: Drive-thru cars wrapped around the building ... pretty much sums it up! Great food, efficient and courteous crew.

name: Lillie Ray
text: Always excellent

name: erica fultz
text: Yall always nice & I love that you have a reward program in your app.

name: bridget
text: Best staff out of any restaurant out there. Super fast and accurate too.

name: Pamela Burckel
text: This location have  the typical good food, friendly service is a clean place that I visit every time that I pass through Tallahassee, unless it's a Sunday when they're closed.

name: Mike Pancoast
text: Really long line but it didn't take as long as I thought it would.

name: Rhonda W
text: Breakfast was great, I received the wrong item, but they provided the correct item quickly and professionally. Great experience as always.

name: Frank Trotter
text: I gotta' give a shout out to Kenya, who took my order with the biggest smile on her face you could ever see. I had a bowl of spicy deliciousness which is also called their Taco Soup. I mean, it was so good, I wanted to lick the bowl and prolly would have if I wasn't inside the restaurant. BTW, Briggs and Thane were outside doing a great job taking orders in the rain to keep that drive thru moving along but they also took the time to greet me and hold the door open for me. The Daphne Chick-fil-A is such a quality place--great ownership, great team members, and quite honestly there were a bunch of fun people in there tonight and every single one of them also had a smile on their face...but not as big as Kenya's smile was!

name: Donnie Ricketts
text: Always friendly staff. Always good food. Never a problem. Great place to eat.

name: Paul Spencer
text: Typical of all Chic Fila restaurants, the service was awesome!

name: Jessica Torres
text:
I have been going for my lunch break once a week, and the service is excellent. Even though the line is long, their system keeps it moving. The staff is efficient and polite.
Their drive through is confusing. You need to circle the building to get in the line.

name: Sheree “Gigi” Thornton
text: Fast, friendly and I have never been displeased with the quality of the food.

name: Bob Carlen
text:
Ordered a kids meal plus my food and spent 24.00$
My child saw other children with a free ice cream . Went to get one for my child and they refused to give it to her because she had already taken the plastic off of her toy. Not fair as far as I’m concerned! Especially since we had the kids bag and toy in our hand and had been there for at least two hours! I also was never told she could even have the free ice cream and no rules about opening the toy were posted.

name: Scotty Stimpson
text: Excellent Chick Fil A! Great staff and speedy service!

name: Sandra Felsher
text: Took us 25 minutes to get our mobile order..not the service i have come to expect from chick fil a.  However, as we were eating our fresh hot meal , the manager came over, apologized for the wait time and told us he comped our entire meal. That is why i love chick fil a! I have come to rely on  their great service but no one can be perfect all the time and how you handle those bad days makes all the difference!

name: Daniel Retzloff
text: Suspiciously nice and efficient inside this joint.  I mean like maybe they are robots or something.

name: Susan Miles
text:
Easy to get to from the street, but a pain to get out of. There's a road with a light on the north side of Target.
Always clean. Prompt, courteous service. Will bring your food to your table if dining in. And one of the last places that have a play area. Also kept very clean. The food is great, as always.

name: Tabitha M.
text: Normally I’m 100% satisfied with this location (other than the super long lines) which is why I’m giving 3 stars.. but today my chicken sandwich was soggy and fell apart, chicken was in like 3 pieces instead of one patty and had soggy breading, and my fries were not cooked all the way and the drive thru worker seemed annoyed and not pleasant. Thought I was at McDonald’s for a sec

name: Allen Hollis
text: Excellent service as expected, amazing staff and great food.

name: Dianna McClure
text: It is sort of tricky to maneuver into the drive thru at this Chick-fil-A. Then there is no screen to look at. A hostess politely takes your order but I am not familiar with the menu so I had to request one. The service was fast and food was hot..order was correct.

name: Karen Peacock
text: Hey, it's Chick-fil-A...   No more needs to be said.   Food is delicious and employees are the best!   Even if there's a long line in the drive-thru, it still doesn't take long!   They do an A+ job!!

name: Kimberly Griffin
text: Seemed very detached tonight. Got my drink wrong and that's my favorite part..then my fries  were half full. Not the best visit visit

name: Peter Rambacher
text: Best customer service and most friendly staff of any fast food restaurant.

name: Rachel Phillips
text: This restaurant is very clean and orderly, the staff is always in a good mood, greeting you with a smile and leaving you with a "My Pleasure".  The bathrooms are clean, the food is delicious and the atmosphere of being here keeps you wanting to come back over and over again.  GREAT Family Place to Eat!

name: Leonard Dinsmore
text: Very quick and efficient getting what you order.

name: Dianna McClure
text: It is sort of tricky to maneuver into the drive thru at this Chick-fil-A. Then there is no screen to look at. A hostess politely takes your order but I am not familiar with the menu so I had to request one. The service was fast and food was hot..order was correct.

name: Jessica Torres
text:
I have been going for my lunch break once a week, and the service is excellent. Even though the line is long, their system keeps it moving. The staff is efficient and polite.
Their drive through is confusing. You need to circle the building to get in the line.

name: Kyle Muskopf
text: Quick, friendly. And clean service. I never have a problem here. One of if not the best sevice in town

name: Shantathia Sims
text: Definitely not what is expected from a Chick Fil A. Last few visits have been terrible. I visit this location frequently, because it’s like 2 minutes from my house... but I guess I’ll just take the extra drive to the Spanish Fort location.

name: Regina Stanton
text: My son loves it here and he refuses to eat chicken nuggets unless they are from chic-fil-a! 😄 my food is always hot and fresh.  The play are gives incentive for my son to eat all his food then he plays while I get to enjoy my food. Win-win 😁 always clean. And impeccable service

name: Tabitha M.
text: Normally I’m 100% satisfied with this location (other than the super long lines) which is why I’m giving 3 stars.. but today my chicken sandwich was soggy and fell apart, chicken was in like 3 pieces instead of one patty and had soggy breading, and my fries were not cooked all the way and the drive thru worker seemed annoyed and not pleasant. Thought I was at McDonald’s for a sec

name: Lenora Mest
text: It was awesome the staff was so friendly and food was great. Will be back soon

name: Leonard Dinsmore
text: Very quick and efficient getting what you order.

name: Peter Rambacher
text: Best customer service and most friendly staff of any fast food restaurant.

name: Sheree “Gigi” Thornton
text: Fast, friendly and I have never been displeased with the quality of the food.

name: Susan Miskovski
text: Don't get me wrong I LOVE Chic Fil A. However this store is the pits as far as customer service and inside carry out. If you are not using the drive thru you WAIT.It is not only my opinion There were customers waiting and saying the same things about the wait. There portions are ALWAYS smaller and just Ok. If you want GREAT service and food like you expect go to Chic Fil A in Spanish Fort on HWY 181. WELL worth the drive.

name: BrandyLyn Patrick
text: ALWAYS GOOD SERVICE AND GOOD FOOD! THEY NEVER GET MY ORDRR WRONG! HOW DO THEY DO IT?!

name: Nikita Dolby
text: Love this location. They are always the epitome of excellent service and the food is consistantly perfect

name: Frances Myers
text: Ordered a # 1 as always in the drive thru, No way to check your order as they are pushing you through the line. Got back to my office & had 3 sandwiches. I REALLY WANTED MY WAFFLE FRIES ! Never had my order wrong before , guess that there is a first time for everything.

name: Regina Stanton
text: My son loves it here and he refuses to eat chicken nuggets unless they are from chic-fil-a! 😄 my food is always hot and fresh.  The play are gives incentive for my son to eat all his food then he plays while I get to enjoy my food. Win-win 😁 always clean. And impeccable service

name: Chuck Ellis
text: Best service in the industry by far! Great chicken friendly staff and did I mention the Icecream Cone? 😁

name: Jonathan Williams
text: I enjoy the tortilla soup on cold days.

name: Ari
text: I have a very hit or miss experience with Chick-Fil-A as of late. I've been shorted food, been given medium drinks when I pay for large, but occasionally I get amazing service with no problems. So it depends on when you go I suppose.

name: Sunny Cooper
text: It's a great place family friendly

name: Amber Turrentine
text:
I have never seen a Chick-fil-A  so unorganized and rude. We have been there a few times and generally get met with service that is mediocre at best. None of the employees ever look happy or offer that great customer service Chick-fil-A  is known for.

Today was beyond frustrating and caused me to be late for work. I placed a pick up order and at 12:24. At 12:33 I recieved the notification that my food was ready. At 12:41 my food still wasn't  ready. The employees were not wanting to help. Finally one asked me to provide my receipt. Out of the last 5 times I’ve ordered at the Daphne location, there has been something wrong with my food. They need to get it together. There are several other people complaining about this location as well. Chic Fila is the only fast restaurant I’ll eat at, but I’ve finally decided not to order anything from this location anymore. text: I just went to chic fil a on 98 at daphne today. The experience was amazing. It was supposedly  "cow day." Every one wore spotted shirts and got discounts. There were families and children,  happy, all around, yet there still enough room for me to dine in yet this was meant to be more of a smaller drive through store.  I had my food within five minutes. Unlike a lot of restaurants the credit card swipe machine worked fast and smoothly. My food tasted great. A manager even sat down and interviewed me with my experience (I ate in). I had a iced coffee and it was surprisingly tasty. The servers were very generous happy, friendly,  and giggling while maintaining a serious working mentality. I recommend this to anyone coming to this chic fil a location. - Leif

name: Babbeloni
text: Consistency is key. Love this place!

name: Ginny Carlisle
text: This was by far the dirtiest Chick Fil A we have visited. The tables and seats  were sticky and covered with food. The floors hadn't been swept and there were squished fries everywhere. The worst was the fact that we had to keep swatting at flies. I was totally shocked that a Chick Fil A would be so nasty. Probably not going back at least not to eat inside.

name: Jamie Hadden
text: Tasty chicken,  pleasant staff, and even though it's always busy, they go out of their way to streamline the experience with extra staff.

name: Courtney F
text: This is my favorite Chick-fil-A in the area. The drive-thru is always fast; at their busiest times, they have people taking orders on tablets. The employees are mostly friendly, and even the ones who aren't friendly are professional and proficient. The food is great (of course). I've never gotten a wrong order or a bad order. The only thing to be aware of is that there are students from a local school who often come here during lunch, so it may be extra busy from time to time.

name: James Chance
text: Food is great, staff are friendly and no matter how busy they are they are they get your food to you quick and it's always correct!

name: Steven Bradley
text:
Edit: One of the worst experiences this trip. Slowest service ever at any CFA. After we received our order (it had an error), I had to walk back up to the register where I was ignored by several staff members, and a manager who walked by multiple times.

The "chick-fil-a app" is pure garbage. It crashes constantly while trying to place an order. After finally getting an order placed, it showed ready for pick up. The staff had no clue how to fulfill the order. I had to wait for a manager to look at my phone, and he hesitantly filled the order.

Previous visit: Fast, polite, and great food!

Also, one of the few fast food chains that still has a play area!

My kids always pick Chick-fil-A.

name: Kelly F
text: It usually seems chaotic inside and outside the building, although the employees are nice. It's fast food, so I don't really feel the need to explain the quality of the food, but if you're in need of a quick protein meal I would choose here over most places. Price is average for what you get. They REALLY need to fix the drive-thru situation, though. Their drive-thru lines block traffic for Target customers and people trying to navigate on Hwy 98. Which, really, is more-so an issue with the level of ignorance and self-centeredness of their customers who willingly block traffic just to use the drive-thru, when there are myriad parking spaces available...but I digress.

name: Paul Miller
text: I just had an experience that I've never had before at a Chick-fil-A. I pulled up to the restaurant at 6:05 and my food was not handed to me until 6:40. I waited in the drive thru line for 5 minutes that was at standstill and then I decided to go inside.  The two cashiers had a dazed look on their face as they slowly waited on customers which took 10 minutes and then I stood there waiting on my food for another 20 minutes. mind you that it was dinner time and the server told me that the holdup was that they were waiting on the two Chick-fil-A sandwiches. Entertainment that I had during this whole weight was watching the employees slowly sonder back and forth behind the counter.

text: The curbside ordering is not good for all people.  Looking at the menu allows people see all of their options to chose from and not feel so rushed.  We ordered several items but the one that has me puzzled is the sausage burrito. We were unaware that has browns are put in the breakfast burritos. (That goes back to not  being able to view the menu.). The sausage burrito had two pieces of sausage... One piece on one end and one piece on the other. It had plenty of hashbrowns on it. If we wanted hashbrowns... We would have ordered them.  I'm disappointed to say the least. One other thing... Not everyone requires a drink carrier.  That is a waste of paper and not to mention elevates supply cost.

text: If you want the best made sandwiches at a Subway, than this is your place. Excellent customer service, and the subs looked so appetizing, couldn't wait to get home to eat. They tasted just as good as they looked, so thanks so much! Definitely recommend. 💜😊

name: ___ BIGMIKE___
text: Stood in the store for 15 minutes today and the girl behind the counter didn't even acknowledge I was standing there. I was just trying to get some food before I had to go to work. Seemed like the girl didn't care I was standing there. She didn't say good morning or hi or anything of that nature. She just continued to do inventory.

name: Demi Weaver
text: This subway is probably the cleanest, freshest and most friendly one Iv been too. Anytime I go in they’re cleaning and restocking fresh veggies, meats, cheeses and bread! Kudos to you guys!!!!

name: Bri Griffin
text: My sandwich was more bread than anything. The order taker only put 3 slices of turkey on my sandwich. I was not pleased with the service at all. Save your money and go to another sandwich shop were they aren't stingy with the meat

text: Awesome

name: lionspiritualjourney
text: I want to say that despite subway not having a veggie sub standard this person was able to make me a veggie sub without me having to walk the line. Other subways have let me walk out the door because they would not make me a veggie sub unless I walked the line. Great job you guys. Independent thinkers when times call for it.

name: Niecy Powell
text: This Subway is Amazing. I received great customer service from Brian. He had really genuine vibe about himself and that's always a Win!! for me.  I definitely will be going back and getting more of the great customer service and the great food of course.

name: Dustin Stafford
text: Ordered extra cheese didn't even get cheese at all. But other than that it's ok.check before you leave.

name: Angela D
text: Getting your money's worth went out the door at this subway.. My steak sandwich had not a heaping scoop like other subway sandwich shops and the order taker had the nerve to level out the meat on the scoop.  I believe what topped it all is the order taker made mention out loud that all they got was $2 each. Don't they get paid an hourly wage? And did she really deaerve a tip after she leveled my meat out instead of a heaping scoop. Big business really is gorging America because they can. Because there is no one to stand up against these franchises who want way more in money but do mot match the product. I am very disappointed in what I received today. I will not be going back anytime soon. I know my x comment wont matter. Subeay2will continue to find ways to cut back and get more of our monies. Thanks for a lousy lunch.

name: glenn ulmer
text: The young Lady who Prepared My Order was Very Nice and Courteous! Yes I would gladly go Back.

text: The food was great that wasn't the problem, the young man working the counter was very very respectful. My problem was the female  cashier was very very rude to a Hispanic couple placing their order. It was very clear that the Hispanic gentlemen could not speak good English, instead of her trying to  understand and be patient with the PAYING CUSTOMERS she yelled at him to speak up and then laughed as if it was funny.

name: Mark Elders
text: We recently received great, polite, friendly service and terrific food at Subway (restaurant), 424 Cahaba Park Circle, Birmingham, Alabama 35242, from Erin and Macon. They welcomed us when we entered and they encouraged us to return. We will. Thanks so much and God bless! Mark N Tim Elders

name: Nita Karki
text: I went there during weekdays  around 1 clock. I love eating at subway and I eat there all the time because it's healthy and quick. I have been to this subway maybe couple times and I had no problem until my last visit. When I went there, it was an elderly lady working and when she made my sandwich I was SHOCKED. I understand food cost is high, but the amount of stuff she put in my sandwich was literally almost NOTHING. I mean I am paying almost $8 for a sandwich right??? and I always get chicken and bacon ranch and she even short it on the meat part because I eat the same stuff every time I go so I know how much it's there which I did not say anything but once she started to put veg, I was like forget it, I am paying this much money for what???? please guys don't ever go there, it is not worth it, go to different store, you will get much more for your money!!

text: Everytime you go in this place, they never have item.  Half the time, the air never work. Workers stay catching an attitude. The manager never be on location. Don't won't to give refunds. Workers state they can't call manager, they don't know his number . Very unprofessional to be one of 2 eateries in the area.

name: Dawn Beekman
text: Awwful morning employes except jessica...the other girl was rude.the little African american kid....went to get a footlong spanich wrap n she put 2 pieces  of chesse on it well subway a footlong is 4 your rule so why put 2 on a footlong...well anyway I wanted extra chesse......well her sassy brat mounth was so rude puts her hand up at me like I'm nothing gonna be all rude well I'll never go in there again and  I'll let everyone know in moundville not to go unless certain people are there....very disappointed n I'm not the only one........

name: Brian Cook
text: Horrible They were more worried about eating and hanging outside at their car than service.  Out of ham, wraps, only two types of bread and toaster and microwave didn't work. Their ice machine hasn't worked in month's. There seven of us all together. We drove to Tuscaloosa to eat. And we live in fosters.

name: Irving Santi
text: They should closed this location.....worst costumer service ever and they always are out of items...and today their toaster is broken so don’t even here!!!!!

text: they need to learn how to answer a phone.

text: Good sandwiches.

name: Martha Gibbs
text: Best

name: Rachel Ward
text: First time ordering from here as it was highly recommended from a friend. The rib sandwich was decent, wouldn’t get it again. Did not know what chow chow was but hot damn it was delicious. Their slaw and stuffed potatoes are divine. The cashier told us to have a blessed day and that just topped the cherry on the superb customer service they have.

name: Randy Silver
text:
Good bbq and service. Meals are huge and a kids meal may satisfy you.
Clean place w well lit parking in a safe area.
Good value for price.

name: Frog Price
text:
Great dinner. We met an old friend. Menu offerings were varied. BBQ baked potato was HUGE and meaty with lots of cheese. Was served piping hot. Meat was tender and lean. BBQ sauce was just right. Wife's sandwich, fries and baked beans were delicious. Our friend got BBQ chicken. Said it was wonderful with a great texture. Was very complementary of the food.
Place was spotless during the evening rush. Restrooms were neat, clean and well stocked.
Too far away for our regular rotation but should be on our goto list.

name: Gabriel Mendez-Frances
text:
Hands down one of if not the best Bar-B-Que restaurant in Alabama. Full Moon does it all right - the food tastes great, the atmosphere is friendly, and the menu is vast and full to the brim with soul food. Full Moon is a bit pricier than most places, but it is every bit worth it. Try the half-moon cookies, if you have the space for it!

Also, I have a friend of mine who works here and it's very entertaining to pretend I don't know who she is when I stop by.

name: Angelica Martinez
text: I like the giant chicken bake potatoe. The sweet tea is delicious and the service is excellent. I like to come to this place because is clean and niece.

name: Aeronica Jones
text: This is our favorite stop for brisket, sausage, and pulled pork. We highly recommend this restaurant.  Another feel good experience on day date with hubby.

name: Stephanie R. Tinney
text:
Went to full moon again today.  This was my first putting since pandemic.   As per the usual they killed it!  In the kitchen, in our surroundings.   I love that place.  Never have I ever had a bad experience at full moon!!
#BBQloving

name: Jonathan Holland
text: I used to buy a slab of ribs a week here and they were excellent, but about the last 7 slabs have been tougher than shoe leather. I've kept trying slab after slab hoping they will improve, but nothing has changed. When you are spending $25 on a slab of ribs they should be perfect every time! There is zero margin for error with a price like that. If ever you find yourself in their Montgomery location, try their slabs of ribs because they are tender and perfect every single time.

name: Velma Wilson
text: The ribs were on point so tender, seasoned just right, the fried okra was very good. Mac and cheese was good, but not the best I have had.

name: Momma Tee
text: Had a call in order and they said it would be ready in 20 minutes. Because I was close I decided to go and be prepared to wait. I arrived 10 minutes early and once I gave her my name, I was out the door in three. That's what I call service, plus the food was just right

name: Erica Hawkins
text: Personally I thoroughly enjoyed everything I ordered, but my husband’s dinner wasn’t too appetizing. From the time I called my order in to the moment I picked it up, everything was great. The employee didn’t rush me at all, he even answered a couple of questions I asked and offered several suggestions on things to try. I am so glad I did too! Did you know they have deviled eggs? They do and they’re absolutely delicious. I ordered their rib plate and they tasted like they were just taken off the grill. My husband ordered a bbq sandwich and it was just a bit on the dry side with very little sauce. The customer service and food was great and I will be returning very soon. You should too.

name: Jennifer Murcks
text: Full Moon in Fultondale is usually a long wait. I have never been and not been put in drive-thru time out. The food however is great and the staff has always been friendly and helpful.

name: Rebekah Janicke
text: Food was good. My service was a mite slow though. I would probably eat here again. I didn't go in just went through the drive thru.

name: Anna Hinton
text: Order was for a plain bbq sandwich.  Said no slaw on sandwich.  When sandwich comes out there was slaw all over my sandwich.  I can not eat cabbage and orderd so i wouldnot get any. Was with other peopl so did not git order fixed.

name: Caroline Williamson
text: The food was delicious! Large portions, great price. The restaurant was clean and sanitized. Our server bowed and remained silent while we said grace. I will be a return customer!

name: Ryan Cass
text: I love this Full Moon BBQ location, for the past 9 years my friends and I have stopped in for lunch on our way to the World of Wheels car show and every year the BBQ here is on point. I love their smoked wings and I tried the sweet heat sauce today and it was very good with the ranch. I only wish the location in Huntsville where I’m from was as good as this location here in Fultondale.

name: Mary Sumrall
text: Great food and service!  My chicken breast was smoked and moist; the squash casserole and collards are the best around!

name: Kevin Sanders
text: The food is usually really good and good service. The problem I have is when you pay over 4 dollars for a slice of pie and you get a tiny piece that is half the size of the container it comes (which is about the size of a regular slice of pie) in. You get 10% pie , 40% whip cream, & 50% container. It sucks to pay that much money and it not last 3 bites.

name: Rebecca Valera
text: We were driving through and wanted some good lunch that we can't get in Ohio so we tried out this place. Omg. It was so good! So good in fact that we made it a point to stop there on our way back and even bought dinner for later when we were done with lunch 😂 we definitely don't get legit bbq like this in Ohio. Even got my son a shirt because he loved it so much. When he took the first bite I heard a loud mmmmmmmmm.

name: Steven
text: Today after the tornado from yesterday the crew that works this location was cooking food in their catering or portable grills in the parking lot to provide food, free of cost, to anyone in the area working. They provided this service with a smile and a great attitude. It's places like this, in times like today that remind me there are still great people out there. Thank you guys for lunch!

name: Terrance Santana
text: I visit this place a lot since I work in the area. I must say the service is always excellent and they keep the place neat constantly. Prices are reasonable and they serve large portions.

name: Stanley Taylor
text: Never been there or even heard of this place but so happy we went there.  Excellent food and service.  I highly recommend it.

name: Thomas McGill
text: Good Bar-B-Q, not great. Nice staff and atmosphere. Great place for SEC football fans.

name: JD
text: Always great food and service. Staff and owners friendly and helpful. No place better around to eat.

name: Mike S
text: Best full moon you will ever eat at .. great service always and consistently great food. Squash caserole is incredible !!! Dont have enough good things to say about this place.. dont be discouraged if ya go at lunch and its crowded.... it is crowded for reason !!!!  They move pretty swift so calm down itll be worth the wait!!

name: A. Hollis
text: Loved the ribs tips. Plenty of food, I was able to eat of it for 2 days.

name: Angie Campbell Hopkins
text: The bbq was hot and tasty. I got a slice of lemon icebox pie, it was delicious and tasted homemade.

name: Clay Maddox
text: Great food and service. Enjoyed the pork baked potato. It was a large serving. Very tasty. Employees great. Dining room clean and COVID ready with distancing at tables. Employees wearing masks.

name: corey hill
text: Omg I'm so glad they opened a location here in huntsville!

name: Jim Puckett
text: Great tasting bbq chicken sandwich, great sauce. Nice portion meals. This store would well up north. Glad we found it.

name: Crystal Byrams
text: Absolutely the best stuffed potatoes anywhere!!! Have never had a bad experience eating here. Highly recommend

name: jim tedesco
text: Highly recommend.  Great place to stop to eat if you are taking a long drive on 65

name: mary hosea
text: Delicous , add a lil more flavor to meat. A lot of people don't care for sauce ( I'm allergic ) thank you.

name: Dave Hackworth
text: Still the best BBQ in the area!! The food was great and the staff were all fantastic.

name: Emily Milhouse
text: Food is great with seasoning they get your order right with pride. Fultondale is my favorite location.

name: Gavin Lawler
text: Once again one of the best places to have a great meal.

name: John Douglas
text: We were glad to have stumbled upon this place on our way south. Good bbq. Alabama and Auburn are both well represented with memorabilia. Roll Tide!

name: Wayne D Chappell Jr
text: The food and service are always excellent!  Even the drive-thru on a Friday night is high speed!

name: Tim Suggs
text:
Takes "DAYS" to eat the crazy amount of food they serve you here!  True of their dessert cakes and pies too! Super Fast, Super Clean, Super Nice!

Now I'm NOT a "Chow Chow" person, and if you aren't either, BEWARE that they DO serve "Chow Chow" on their BBQ sandwiches unless you order it WITHOUT the "Chow Chow"

Best BBQ Sauce in the City! OMG you should see the size of their onion rings! HUGE!  Everybody who worked their was masked. I just had a chopped BBQ sandwich, that was perfectly, finely chopped, and my wife had their BBQ Brisket that was tender and succulent. Their squash casserole is a "Religious Experience" all unto itself.

It can be difficult to get into or out of their parking lot, but trust me, it's worth it any minor hassle that might present. WARNING...  Do NOT bring your Mama to this place to eat cause she will suddenly start slapping herself silly on the drive home after eating here!

name: Joey Anderson
text: Food is always delicious.  Drive thru speed is hit or miss, but overall I enjoy eating from here.

name: Jacquelyn Miller
text: My First Time Eating There Last Night And I Loved The Whole Experience The Broccoli Baker I Had Was Delish My Boyfriend Loved His Big Boy Baker As Well Customer Service Was On Point...The Vibe Was Enjoyable Thank You 😊

name: Betty H
text: Normally I would give them a 10, but this time my food was not up to par.

name: Sean Dunn
text: The BBQ is amazing (best white sauce in Bham), but the half moon cookies are what have us coming back!

name: Melissa Kirk
text: Love our BBQ and FullMoon is some of the best. Can't beat their brisket and chowchow!

name: Maria Stoves
text:
Full moon
yesterday was really BAD the meat has really tough Now a
We are talking Sandwich hard to chew they was not business so what happen? Normally you Rock  but on yesterday you were a  Flat (F)

name: Linda White
text: Food was good. Service was prompt. I ordered barbecue which is always a risk for me because I love my North Carolina barbecue. I wasn't disappointed

name: Donna Heath
text: I wasn't impressed...I was hoping for a set down place...it was more fast food....did not care for it...I felt rushed to order...I did not know the order before came in...1st time there and will be last time there.

name: Ayla Kelley
text: The food was alright. I got the pork sandwich. If I go back ill definitely try something else.

resp.text: Hi Ayla, thank you for your feedback. Please feel free to contact our marketing coordinator at erin@fullmoonbbq.com to discuss your experience further. We want to hear from you!

name: Taylor Wheeler
text: The food here is terrible. We couldn’t pull the ribs apart to even be able to eat them. The Mac n cheese is dry and taste awful. The okra is burnt. The girls working the front counter were rude when we walked in and so was the girl bringing our food out. It was all around a terrible experience and we will not be returning here again.

resp.text: Hi Taylor, thank you for your feedback. Please feel free to contact our marketing coordinator at erin@fullmoonbbq.com to discuss your experience further. We want to hear from you!

name: Shaun Watkins
text:
Bbq plate was great!!!
Chicken wings not so good.

name: Taylor Files
text: I love the okra, Mac n cheese, and salads. My only complaint is that the Greek Dressing is hit or miss. Sometimes is too thick and lumpy, sometimes is thin and taste weird, and other times it’s absolutely perfect.

name: Corky Reed
text: Never disappointed. Great food and friendly people.

name: Carrie Smith
text: Pulled pork was underseasoned without bbq sauce. But the sides were really good and so was the sliced turkey.

name: Elizabeth Douglas
text: This is by far the best BBQ in the Gardendale/Fultondale area. The food is always amazing and the service is speedy considering they’re almost always have a packed house. Anything I’ve ever ordered has been excellent. The portions are generous, the sauce is delicious, and the meat is always done to perfection. The sandwiches and ribs are especially good. Last night, I ordered a salad with turkey, and was amazed at just how delicious and fresh it was. The turkey was so tender and so juicy. The greens and tomatoes were crisp and ripe, and the shredded cheese and the blue cheese dressing were outstanding. Full moon is always a good bet!

resp.text: Hi Elizabeth, we're so glad you had a great experience at our Fultondale Full Moon! Be sure to take home some of our award-winning desserts at your next visit!

name: Wayne Plunkett.
text: Food was not up to Full Moons usuall standard, looked like it hastily placed in container!!

resp.text: Hi Wayne, thank you for your feedback. Please feel free to contact our marketing coordinator at katie@fullmoonbbq.com to discuss your experience further. We want to hear from you!

text: Very disappointed food was not good have ate that before and was good but not today and Cost more than last time

name: Paul West
text: Great food and even better service.  Very reasonable prices as well

name: Tomiko Moore
text: Great location friendly staff.We had a Retirement luncheon

name: N C
text: DON'T USE THE DRIVE THRU! You should not always expect that something is going to be wrong with your order. Time and time again, you get home and there is something wrong with your order. Again on 4/25/2021, get home and they have left something off your order. Spend over $37 for 2 people to eat and it is  not even correct. Trying to support local and absolutely love Tony but things should be better.

resp.text: Hi, thank you for your feedback. Please feel free to contact our marketing coordinator at erin@fullmoonbbq.com to discuss your experience further. We want to hear from you!

text: Unfriendly cashier at drive thru and there's a ton of staff working at once without facial masks. I won't be going here to this location anymore. The pandemic is still in motion people.

resp.text: Hi there, thank you for your feedback. Please feel free to contact our marketing coordinator at katie@fullmoonbbq.com to discuss your experience further. We want to hear from you!

text: Seems like there's always a line . Drive through is speedy and orders are usually accurate.

name: Courtney Crick
text: Great service.  Food was fantastic!!!

name: Mark Aultman
text: Some of the best BBQ around.  Very consistent and delicious.  Love the chocolate pie.

name: crystal davenport

name: Dawncember Willis
text: Unfriendly cashier at drive thru and there's a ton of staff working at once without facial masks. I won't be going here to this location anymore. The pandemic is still in motion people.

resp.text: Hi there, thank you for your feedback. Please feel free to contact our marketing coordinator at katie@fullmoonbbq.com to discuss your experience further. We want to hear from you!

name: April Hatcher
text: I visited this Full Moon in Fultondale because I was in the area, I decided to go in to place a to-go order since the drive-thru line was rather long.  To my surprise, there were at least 2 families of 3 or more members that entered after me and none of the 2 families had on a mask.  But the website simply states under Health and Safety "mask required".  They were not asked to put on a mask or was not refused service because they weren't wearing masks!  This goes against all CDC guidelines.  And it made me EXTREMELY uncomfortable because we are still in a pandemic where millions have contracted COVID and died.  I will be filing a complaint with the board of health asap.  Obviously this establishment is putting money/business before safety/health of customers.

resp.text: Hi April, thank you for your feedback. Please feel free to contact our marketing coordinator at erin@fullmoonbbq.com to discuss your experience further. We want to hear from you!

name: James Powers
text: Good bbq pork sandwich on previous visit, worst chicken wings I ever had.  Inedible.  Rubbery skin. Under cooked.  Said they were smoked, could not prove it by me.  The sauce was ok/good.  Pricey. Yuck.

resp.text: Hi James, thank you for your feedback. Please feel free to contact our marketing coordinator at erin@fullmoonbbq.com to discuss your experience further. We want to hear from you!

name: Easter Grant
text: The smoked wings are awesome.  Very favorable and a nice size..

name: Steven Harris
text: Hands down the best BBQ in Alabama. The best thing about it is the cleanliness of the entire restaurant

name: David Willmon
text: Best place for barbeque and service. Our order was incorrectly when we got home. We took it back and the manager there was the nicest ever. Replaced everything and it was great. We will always be back. Mr. Tarwater is the best thing ever happened to the Fultondale Full Moon.

name: Chuck Smith
text: Horrible experience ordered two hamburgers made me pull ahead and wait evidently forgot about me had to go in to get the food 20 minutes later got the food girl at window unfriendly

name: Andrew Tutten
text: I love this place. Everytime I'm on the road to visit my family up in Huntsville I stop for dinner here. I'm a big fan of the stuffed potatoes! They're huge!! I'm planning a trip back to visit my folks and I'm already excited about stopping here again to get my fix!

name: Lora Benson
text: Went thru drive thru. Food was hot and good. Service was a plus. Wait time minimal.

name: Shadonna White
text: Their smoke wings & soup is the bomb. Service is always great.

name: Shelly F
text: Love Full Moon BBQ! My favorite is the smoked turkey salad and fried green tomatoes!! I have this every time I'm in Fultondale. 😋

name: Connor Bright
text: They serve big dishes and for reasonable prices. super friendly owner. Will visit again.

name: Greg Slappey
text: Delicious BBQ,great service. The young folks working here are the kindest, with recent knee surgery, I'm not getting around to well and they took good care of me and was understanding about hanging around way to long to watch the game. Thanks Fultondale Full Moon.

name: Jeff Beasley
text:
The Barbq Chicken baker is great!
Easily enough for 2 to split!

name: Scott Veitch
text: Excellent food and service. Clean social distanced dining.

name: suzanne Randall
text: Stopped on our way home from an outing bought a pound of meat plus the fixes and get this they put in buns and cookies for dessert. Definitely A+

name: Julie Stanley
text: Food was good, great service and clean, glad to see the place was open to eat

name: Easter Grant
text: The smoked wings are awesome.  Very favorable and a nice size..

The Barbq Chicken baker is great!

name: The crazy panhandlefoodie
text: Decided to stop here and try the BBQ. I had high hopes because of the stacks of wood as you pull up to the drive-thru. I ordered the rib plate and I was disappointed, I was expecting lightly sauced fall off the bone ribs and I got the opposite. The ribs had major tug and drowning in sauce. I couldn’t really taste the smoke on the ribs because all I was tasting was sauce. The Brunswick stew was nothing special, was a little watery for my taste. Customer service was spot on, just wish the food would have matched.

text: Excellent food and service. Clean social distanced dining.

name: Greg Slappey
text: Delicious BBQ,great service. The young folks working here are the kindest, with recent knee surgery, I'm not getting around to well and they took good care of me and was understanding about hanging around way to long to watch the game. Thanks Fultondale Full Moon.

name: Johnathan Hampton
text: As a Texas resident, I decided to see what Alabama bbq was all about and boy was I disappointed. I had the ribs (spare & baby back) brisket and sausage link, unsauced. The meat barely had a smoke ring and none of the food had any seasoning. The bbq sauce however, was great. I had to drown my food in the sauce to enjoy it. The sides were mediocre at best. The okra was good. The one standout dish was the fried catfish. It was well seasoned and fried just right. This did not compare to Texas bbq in any way. I don't think I'll visit again.

resp.text: Hi Johnathan, thank you for your feedback. Please feel free to contact our marketing coordinator at erin@fullmoonbbq.com to discuss your experience further. We want to hear from you!

name: Julie Stanley
text: Food was good, great service and clean, glad to see the place was open to eat

name: MyFathers TwoAcres
text: This is one of the best barbecue places in Alabama.  Staff is always friendly and the smell gets you hungry even if your not.  I have eaten at almost every location around Birmingham and it is always good.  They have some huge baked potatoes too.

name: Errick Bobo
text: Decided to stop by during a road trip. I tried the smoked wings and I was very disappointed. I personally know how to smoke wings, and those wings were not smoked. They were either boiled or oven baked with a hint of smoke flavor. Not my first encounter with a restaurant who calls boiled/oven baked wings smoked.

resp.text: Hello Errick, thank you for your feedback. Please feel free to contact our marketing coordinator at emory@fullmoonbbq.com to discuss your experience further. We want to hear from you!

text:
I can not say enough about this Wonderful establishment!
The employees were Very welcoming, Amazing, kind, friendly! Service was superb! The food was Excellent! The store was very clean (including the restroom)! The atmosphere was so pleasant! I appreciate the Christian music! Definitely one of the best experiences I’ve ever had in this area!!!

text: Wonderful as usual!  Always a great meal and fantastic service!

name: Moth Man
text: Always a great place to take family, with great food of all kinds.Whether you want wings, a burger, ribs, this is the place for you. The food is always great and comes out tasting very good, none of it is frozen as they have a very open kitchen where you can see the food being cooked as you order. It’s also very good, with white sauce being my favorite. And the veggies are very tasty, especially the okra and sweet potato casserole. my personal favorite are the “Love me tenders”. Which is chicken, by the way. The staff are always very nice to you and patient while you order. It is a very clean place with nice restrooms and a great atmosphere. Very good food and people. I will always go here while I live in this area!

text: One phrase: deviled eggs in drive through ❤ I need this place in TN!

name: R Matthews aka RJ
text:
Even though I have been driving by this place for over a year I never went there until recently. All I can say is unbelievable and I couldn't wait to go back.  I have gone twice the past 10 days. Currently you can only do drive through. I went to the one in Gardendale, Alabama.  But I would think that they all serve the same menu. Their food is fantastic and their prices are reasonable. I had the loaded potato with chicken and pork.  I think the chicken was better but the meal is so big you can have left overs.

Also they are practicing social distancing more than other restaurants. Overall a 5 star experience.

name: E.T. Hollander
text: Excellent chicken and white sauce.

name: Jereme Stout
text:
I have customer service issues and product issues with this place.

First we were feeding a large group and the cashier kindly recommended that we get a few family packs and then upgrade our 2 pints to 2 quarts for an additional $3.  We pay for the food and start reviewing the receipt as we thought the bill was high, only to notice that they charged us for 2 extra pints at full price.  Pints are 6.95, quarts are 9.95 (may not be exact to the penny but it's close).  I get the three dollar up-charge as that's the difference between the two but why would I pay nearly $14 for 2 pints (2 pints = 1 quart) when I could pay the $10 and get the same thing.  We brought this to what appeared to be the manager on duty (he had a different color shirt than everyone else) and all he would assure us of is that he would speak with the cashier and acted as if we were crazy for questioning the charges for what we received.  He made no offer to correct but only saying "what do you want me to do?".  As a customer service manager you should know full and well what to do.  On this alone I won't be back.

For the product, the brisket was cut thin (who does that) which severely limited the flavor available from the bark.  Got chopped pork, this was insanely dry.  Only saving grace is they give you almost 2 quarts of sauce - it's certainly needed.  On the only positive note, the sausages where pretty good but overall we should all expect better.

resp.text: Hi Jereme, thank you for your feedback. Please feel free to contact our marketing coordinator at kylie@fullmoonbbq.com to discuss your experience. We want to hear from you!

On the wayoutwe gift our guests with a ribboned package of half moon, generous sized cookies and then take photos by the huge full moon signage on the exterior wall! name: Edwina Henslee

name: Mrz Perry
text:
8/16/18 Update

So since the representative received my info and did nothing with it I decided to shop around a bit. Whay I've found is EVERY other bbq spot that serves baked potatoes  is a better bang for your buck. I even made one at home myself and it was worth more than what I spent in time and money at this full moon. I would STRONGLY suggest driving five minutes into tarrant or 15 into roebuck for a MUCH better taste and value experience.

So I visited 7/18/18. Called my order in 20 minutes before arriving and still had 2 wait. THEN for the exact same price as Costas BBQ in Huffman I get HALF the potato... Like SERIOUSLY. It was dry, no sauce, barely any sour cream and NO butter! 😒 Can not WAIT to show the nice people there how their potatoes outrank full moon's. Smdh will NOT be going back. ✌🏾

resp.text: Hello, we sincerely apologize about your poor experience. Could you please provide your contact information to fullmoonsocialmedia@gmail.com? Our manager would like to speak with you directly.

Very long wait for an extremely simple order of a pound of turkey to go. Meat was cold when i finally received it. Seemed that drive-thru business was strongly favored for turnaround time over walk-in orders.

Food was good after reheating at home, however the menu could use clarification on the fact that turkey meat sold by the pound is not served pulled, like the pork, but sliced.

resp.text: Hi Blaine, thank you for your feedback. Please feel free to contact our marketing coordinator at emory@fullmoonbbq.com to discuss your experience. We want to hear from you!

Prompt, great food! Very helpful staff!
Priced just right

name: Vicky Jones
text: Best pies, fast, courteous, fresh

name: Anita Olbon
text: Full Moon Bar-B-Que never disappoints.  The collards are excellent, and the loaded baked potato is enormous and delicious!  I get it with the chicken.  It's a barbeque spot, but the fried catfish is amazing too, and make sure you try the little cornbread muffin.  It has a hint of sweet, and baked just right.  Rob always gets an order of fried green tomatoes and Mac and cheese, and he loves their pulled pork.  We stop at the Walkers Chapel location quite often.

name: r lankford
text: My husband, daughter, and I stopped by last week to eat dinner. The kiddo got the hotdog and fries, she said it was pretty tasty (she loved that it came with a cookie and tattoo) My husband and I both got the bbq pork plate (Which comes with 2 sides and a toasted bun) There is enough meat for 2 sammiches on each plate so you can either pig out at one sitting or have enough for 2 meals. For the sides, I got fries and mac n cheese. The fries were your typical bland unsalted steak fries (still yummy dipped in bbq sauce) and the mac n cheese was eh. It felt like it’d sat for a while and the cheese started to coagulate (almost gritty) My husband got baked beans and fries and he said they were pretty good. The restaurant did a good job keeping people separated as best as they could.

name: KRYSTEN WOODS
text: the food was NOT the full moon I'm used to...I usually visit the the one on the South side or in greensprings...the Fultondale location DID NOT measure up to either location...the meat seemed old...we asked for center cut ribs...the meat was tough and seemed as though...whoever cooked the meat... rushed it...we also both asked for extra sauce on the side when we placed our order...when we asked the lady that brought our food for some...being that we didn't get it to begin with...she brought back one...the baker I got didn't wow me either...seemed as tho it wasn't freshly prepared...hardly no sour cream...or bacon bits..I wish I had taken pics...or taken it right back#dissapointed...to add insult to injury...the counter staff was not professional...before we left we ordered a large drink to go...the manager (heavy set Caucasian gentleman with dark brown hair) was told what to fix...he literally ignored the fact that i was waiting...but continued joking with the staff...I waited a few minutes thinking...maybe he didn't hear the young lady that called out what I ordered...he finally looked around the drink fountain...noticed that by now I was not pleased and asked me "what I needed....WILL NOT BE COMING BACK UNLESS UNDER NEW MANAGEMENT...AND STAFF IS REFRESHED ON CUSTOMER SERVICE

name: Henry Greene
text: I am from the South but have lived in Indiana for years, so when I visit the South I always try to eat some good BBQ. Excellent flavor, big portions, and good sides and desserts.  If you’ve never tried it, I highly recommend it.

text: Great food.  Great service.

name: Catherlene Davis
text: Asked for extra sauce. Only got enough sauce for top slice of bread

name: Rodney Pickle
text: Great grilled chicken. I love it without the sauce with vegetables.  Lower calories.

name: Paula Kessler
text: I have to admit, I really didn't expect much.  I thought it might would be on the fast food side.  Although, it did come out fast, it was a delight to know it didn't taste like fast food.  The vinegar slaw is amazing.   I had the BBQ chicken sandwich and it was delicious.   I will be eating here again!

name: Kieran M
text: The food was amazing! My little brother had a pork sandwich. We went through the drive through this time and the service was still amazing! We will definitely be coming back.

name: Leslie Calvert
text: Fried green tomatoes are amazing..their meat is wonderful but so are their sides and famous half dipped cookies and pie..great chow chow and food

name: Kimberly Allen
text: My meal was wonderful and so was my son's! The pull pork plate and pulled pork sandwich was awesome!!

name: Anna Taylor
text: Love there food the Ribs fall off the bone and there Loaded potatoes is a lot

name: Chantelle Rogers
text: Hubby always gets the open faced pork sandwich and it fills him up....like he can't finish his fries fills him up lol. Kids love the tenders and Mac n cheese. I'm a simple pulled chicken girl, but occasionally splurge and get their AMAZING brisket or ribs. Their vegetable of the day happened to be steamed cabbage and it was amazing! I have had their carrot cake and it's super good too. Honestly I don't think I've ever had anything here that wasn't delicious!

name: Thea Farley
text: I can definitely recommend the smoked wings. You can get them in several flavors. The white sauce is so good that it will make you bite your tongue you will eat so fast. The pies are so good. I suggest that you eat rest a while then eat the pie. I can't say enough about those wings especially if you want wings but not the grease that comes with fried wings.

name: Stephen Mcalister
text: As always amazing food. Dine in is now available

name: Christopher Batten
text: Covid-visited this place, and wished I was a local. Catfish was surprisingly good, BBQ was stellar.

resp.text: Hello Christopher, thank you for your feedback. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your experience at our Fultondale location! We hope to have you back soon!

name: Henry Akins bike
text: Fast and good service

name: Rosa Robinson
text: We love this place. We stop any time we are driving through. Today I had the turkey breast, collard greens, Mac and cheese. It was all very good.

name: Kelly Rickert
text: Very good barbeque.  We stopped on a Thursday eve just going through to Florida. Pulled pork plate was excellent. Cole slaw very good. Not sweet. Unsweet tea- We northerners love them for that! Hubby had brisket & pork. His  very tasty as well. One item the mac & cheese is very bland. But over all would absolutely recommend.

name: Anna Taylor
text: Love there food the Ribs fall off the bone and there Loaded potatoes is a lot

name: Whitney Jackson
text: Amazing staff and meal.

name: Rosa Robinson
text: We love this place. We stop any time we are driving through. Today I had the turkey breast, collard greens, Mac and cheese. It was all very good.

text: Fried green tomatoes are amazing..their meat is wonderful but so are their sides and famous half dipped cookies and pie..great chow chow and food
