text: Very good barbeque.  We stopped on a Thursday eve just going through to Florida. Pulled pork plate was excellent. Cole slaw very good. Not sweet. Unsweet tea- We northerners love them for that! Hubby had brisket & pork. His  very tasty as well. One item the mac & cheese is very bland. But over all would absolutely recommend.

name: Chris Fellows
text: We come here every time we have a meeting in Birmingham. Boss pays so I don't complain. Food here is good and the service is quick. Prices are decent for barbecue. Parking lot is a bit cramped though. We ended up parking next door and hiking down an embankment.

name: Michele Fedak
text: Staff is super friendly & helpful. This was my 1st time, from out of town,  truck is in repair shop & mechanic recommended. They recommended different things to me. DidF is awesome. I thought it was a little pricey but well worth it. Good size portions, actually couldn't even finish it all. Will definitely come back again when in area

resp.text: Hi, Michele! Thank you for the kind words! We are so pleased to hear you chose our restaurant as your place to dine and that you enjoyed it! We hope to see you again soon!

name: Kip Blighton
text:
Smoked pork that tastes like smoked pork
No funny business here, just smoked pork.  Oh, the tea is good.

name: Susan Pollitz
text: If you want the best meal in town go to the FULL MOON IN FULTONDALE AL. There always fast friendly and the food is awesome !!! Best bbq ever !!!

name: Ledree Martin
text: When I went through the drive thru the employees were playing around so much they gave me food without requesting payment. I corrected that! I purchased a bbq chicken sandwich yesterday for my lunch today and it had so many bones I got scared and lost my appetite. I do not and  will not recommend this particular restaurant until new management or serious changes are made. You all need to take food and safety more serious!

resp.text: Hi Ledree, thank you for your feedback. Please feel free to contact our marketing coordinator at emory@fullmoonbbq.com to discuss your experience. We want to hear from you!

name: Tom Mclemore
text: Very fast ser vice, BBQ nachos we're great, easily enough for two to share. The deviled eggs were out of this world. You have to get a 1/2 dozen of the 1/2 moon cookies, be careful when opening the package, you may eat all them at one time.

name: don miller
text: Awesome food,very affordable. They have a little something for everyone. From fish to chicken to pork. The wait isn't long,the atmosphere is cozy.

name: Denise Smith
text: Great food

name: Jeff Marsh
text: Clean fast nice people and very helpful.

name: Kurt Wade
text: One of my favorite places to eat. Kickin Pamento Burger is Amazing!

name: Larry Brown
text: Great Food!

name: tony gray
text: Always good food

name: Chris Fellows
text: We come here every time we have a meeting in Birmingham. Boss pays so I don't complain. Food here is good and the service is quick. Prices are decent for barbecue. Parking lot is a bit cramped though. We ended up parking next door and hiking down an embankment.

name: Kayla Hogan
text: WHAT'S NOT TO LOVE ABOUT THIS BBQ! BEST LOADED POTATO I HAVE EVER EATEN +PORK & CHOW CHOW *THIS CHOW CHOW IS TO DIE FOR IN MY OPINION*!!

name: Betty Williams
text: We pick up to-go at the drive-through. Best BBQ! My fave is the smoked chicken. My husband likes the brisket. We live in Blount County so sandwiches get soggy. No problem. If you ask, they will separate the ingredients for you! Love this place!

name: M Seng
text:
Stopped for lunch on the way south a few weeks ago. I had spent some time researching BBQ joints on my route and Full Moon kept popping up as the place to go. They did not disappoint.

Even though we arrived during the lunch hour, the wait in line was minimal. Wife and I split a couple sandwiches, the smoked turkey and beef brisket, both were simply fantastic. We split an order of onion rings that must have been an entire onion. OMG, they were GREAT!

Don't know when I may be in the area again, but Full Moon Bar-B-Que will definitely be on the radar for another visit.

name: Juanita Farr
text: Tasty food. Ample portions. Limited beer choices at this location. Big selection of BBQ....chicken, pork, & ribs. Good sides that go well with BBQ.

name: jmoakley1
text: If you find a better chain that serves bbq let me know. Great food, atmosphere and customer service!

name: Steve Bennett
text: I always enjoy their ribs

name: tommy reeves
text: Awesome as usual

name: Jarrod Davis
text: Ever in the Birmingham area please go by the place the menu is awesome and don't leave without getting the chocolate chip cookies

name: GEORGE AMBRIZ
text: Food is good , I expect something better for the price ,but employees make it up , there nice and courtesy .

name: Lender Harris
text: Good food

name: Susan Wozniak
text: Good home style cooking, sqeaky clean, attentive staff, and fast service.  Great stop off from I65!

name: Darnesheia Alexander
text: Fast and efficient take out service. Delicious brisket sandwich!

name: Erin Howze
text: Food was prepared quickly and there wasn't a long wait.

name: Doris Brown
text: Great.

name: Jesse Larue
text: The food was good and very quick service

name: bjt 2077
text: This is by far the best barbecue I've ever had and the restaurant is always very clean and has a nice atmosphere.

name: April King
text: The food was great however employee attitude wasn't. We did not hear our number called and the young lady who brought our food attitude was a mess. I will continue to visit however next time I guess I'll eat in to avoid this next time

name: Stephan Hanson
text: We tried this place while visiting friends in Birmingham, Alabama. Not sure if this is a chain or how many states they are in but the food was very good. As a Texan I am very fond of beef-centric bbq, but I do love me some pork ribs. I enjoyed everything about this place.

name: Carrie Foster
text: Fast and fantastic!!!

name: Allie Field
text: One of my favorite places to eat.  Food is plenty here, low priced for food amount, friendly customer service, and I respect their values. I had the pulled Greek salad and he had a loaded potato.  It was loaded alright.  We had to take most of it home because how much was on it.

name: Deric Cain
text: The Chick-fil-A of BBQ! This is a great family BBQ place. The smoked turkey is the best around.

name: Kia Chatman
text: I have had better, but; they are convenient, so it has to do.

name: Williamina Feagin
text: The food was fresh. Great taste. It doesn't take long to get your order

name: Ella lalonde'
text: I absolutely garantee a positively visit when you're here great atmosphere ,nice friendly people, food is served at an so so rate only because they are always busy! Worth the stop my tummy is thanking me for !!\(ϋ)/♩

name: Scott Holmes
text: Always good.  The beef brisket was exceptional today.

name: Nakiii
text: Very clean with great service. I got a veggie plate. Their fried green tomatoes were amazing. I drove back to order more! Will visit again. (Online pricing may not be accurate. It wasn't for sides)

resp.text: Thanks for the love, Golden Pro! Our Fried Green Tomatoes are the BEST!

name: Katie Veglio
text: BBQ was pretty good. Some of the sides tasted like buffet food but service was quick and the atmosphere was great!

name: Reynel Valladares
text: Ok

name: Margaret Batie
text: The food was excellent. I ordered the smoked chicken with Alabama white sauce and sweet potato casserole. Yummy!!!

name: Joseph Bliss
text: Even though it was crowded the service was fast and the food was just as good as always.

name: pangris
text: Went out of our way to try this place based on the reviews and we were not disappointed

name: Judy Jeter
text: The best

name: GiGi Travel Blogs
text: My Favorite Barbecue Spot.

name: Susan Pierce
text: Amazing but busy

name: Keith Walker
text: Great food and good service can't beat it

name: Nathan Watts
text: This is one of my favorite places to eat when traveling down Interstate 65. I have never had a bad experience here. The food is always great! I suggest you try their baked potatoes, they are huge!   Service is always quick and friendly. The facility is always clean and welcoming! If you ever pass by a Full Moon Bar-B-Q be sure to stop in, you will be glad you did!

resp.text: Hey Nathan! You sure know how to make us blush! Thanks for the kind review, we work hard to make sure you have a great experience at Full Moon BBQ! Come back and see us soon.

name: Christine Romano
text: Great food! Fast and very polite service. I've dined in and gotten to-go food. I've have yet to have a poor experience. The management there is doing a great job!

resp.text: Hi Christine, we are so glad you have had great experiences at our Fultondale location! We look forward to your next visit!

name: Bigbudman63 Mejia
text: Ribs, chow chow, catfish, okra and mac and cheese was really good.  Got full so couldn't have dessert.  Taking a whole chicken home for lunch tomorrow.

name: Dewayne Shoulders
text: It was my first time eating there. I really enjoyed. The food was great.

name: Banshi Kat
text: I rarely get a bad plate at full moon.  Had the catfish this visit,  which was a well seasoned, thick filet. Not that thin flimsy filet that's more breading than food.

name: Llewellyn Robinson
text: Good food, very friendly staff... Definitely will be returning

name: LaToya Holmes
text: The food & customer service is always good.

name: Dana Smith
text: The brisket salad was amazing!

name: Terry Greenslade
text: Great place to eat.

name: Travis McBride
text: The food came out fast and the people were really friendly. The place was clean, just a little crowded, but to be expected with the time of day we went. The food was good, as you would expect from a fast food BBQ place.

resp.text: Hi Travis, thank you for the feedback! We're glad you had a good experience!

name: Annamarie Wallace
text: Their food is always hot and delicious! Today they were so nice when I ordered the wrong thing, they didn't even hesitate to correct the order!! They were so polite and fast to make our experience as positive as possible!! They are my BBQ destination no matter my location!!

resp.text: Thanks for the great review, Annamarie! See you again soon!

name: Rhonda Smith
text: Great as usuall & BBQ potatoes was huge as usual. Loved it!!!

name: Brian Hood
text: The next BBQ salad & big Baker

name: Amel Drake
text: Very good BBQ, don't let it being a chain fool you. This stuff is legendary

name: Carlee Smallwood
text: Wouldn't recommend going while busy.. Just left there and paid almost 11$ for a loaded potato that came with less than a teaspoon of sour cream, no butter and a sprinkle of meat and cheese..if it wasn't take out I would have asked for my refund

resp.text: Hi Carlee, thank you for your feedback. Please feel free to contact our marketing coordinator at kylie@fullmoonbbq.com to discuss your experience. We want to hear from you!

name: J Irby
text: Awesome food!

name: William Jennings
text: I got the 2 meat plate. Chicken and Ribs always a great choice. You can choose any two meats, there's a small up charge for Brisket..But it is most definitely worth it. The plate comes with two sides... your regular fair from a quality BBQ restaurant. But I do recommend the beans, and Mac&Cheese.. Full-Moon BBQ is my favorite no matter where I try I always come back to the Moon... You will to

resp.text: Hi William, thank you for the awesome feeback. Come see us soon!

name: Terry Price Ware
text: Wow! So much better than in town locations.  Service superior!  Good tasty!

name: Lewis Petty
text: Good food, big portions. At a decent price. The place is always packed

name: Chris Evans
text: Fantastic BBQ chain. Our large group we're very pleased with the food and service

name: Mark McKinney
text: The BBQ was good but the sides consisting of corn on the cob and steak fries were cold. My wife and daughters baked potatoes were under lukewarm. They replaced my wife's cold potato with a cold BBQ sandwich. This is NOT how their food is usually served. I am going to understand it's New year's Eve but they close at 8CST.  Plenty of time to get ready and get out for New year's Eve events.

name: Valerie Lumpkin
text: Awesome Food

name: Ryan Stubbs
text: Consistently great food and service. Love their smoked turkey for a healthier meat option.  Their pulled pork sandwich is delicious and love their greens.

name: Qdubus Maximus
text: There BBQ Baked Potato is the best you can find anywhere and so big you can share. There chicken fingers are some of the best I've had anywhere. Most places tend to over marinate there chicken. These were just right. Prices are a bit higher than typical BBQ joints but the serving sizes and taste are well worth it

name: Diana White
text: Always an awesome experience at the foultondale location! The workers are so pleasant and courteous! Also the service is always fast. The food is excellent!

name: Jeremy Sopher
text: Staff was amazing and food was awesome! Special thanks to manager for sweet tater casserole, my wife LOVED it! That was above and beyond!

name: Bill Allen
text: Great service, great food. Love to eat here.

name: Amel Drake
text: Very good BBQ, don't let it being a chain fool you. This stuff is legendary

name: Valerie Lumpkin
text: Awesome Food

name: Napoleon Posadas
text: This is a an ALL 5 STAR REVIEW...   This is Truly The BEST BBQ Place I’ve been to... Had the Chicken n Rib Plate with trimmings.  I recommend this Place and don’t forget to come on an Empty Stomach...This is Napster and I APPROVE OF THIS MESSAGE... Keep On Truckin’!!!

resp.text: Hi Napolean, we're so glad to hear that! Be sure to try our bakers, burgers, and award-winning desserts next time you come!

name: patricia fuller
text: Very clean, super nice people, Very good food! Would definitely eat there again.

name: Carlee Smallwood

resp.text: Hi Carlee, thank you for your feedback. Please feel free to contact our marketing coordinator at kylie@fullmoonbbq.com to discuss your experience. We want to hear from you!

name: Tera
text: We got the pulled pork with okra and corn and ribs with mac and cheese and potato salad. Meat was dry. Corn was over cooked and even the cornbread was dry. Mac n cheese and okra was good. And their sauce is actually good.

resp.text: Hi, Tera. While we're happy to hear you enjoyed some of your meal, complete customer satisfaction is our #1 priority. Can you please provide your contact information to fullmoonsocialmedia@gmail.com? Our manager would like to speak with you directly.

name: Brian Hood
text: The next BBQ salad & big Baker

name: Ashley Murphy
text: This place never disappoints!! The food is always hot and cooked to perfection! My family of 7 love going here after church or at night. My daughter and I always share the riblets and a Greek salad and we leave stuffed! Of course with a dozen cookies for when we get home!

name: Kelvin Kimble
text: Good service and food.

name: MrSupr3me
text: the best bbq place in the south! extreme fast service and great food! always crowded but its ok!

name: Jeremy Sopher
text: Staff was amazing and food was awesome! Special thanks to manager for sweet tater casserole, my wife LOVED it! That was above and beyond!

name: Joey
text: The food is always fresh and delicious. The staff is always friendly.

name: Bill C
text: Stopped for lunch today.  Had pork sandwich, a side of greens, sweet tea, and a piece of carrot cake. Everything was great except the cake.  But $17.12 for lunch is ABSOLUTELY RIDICULOUS!!! That should have fed 2 people for that price. Not just 1 person. Won't return.

name: Ashley Murphy
text: This place never disappoints!! The food is always hot and cooked to perfection! My family of 7 love going here after church or at night. My daughter and I always share the riblets and a Greek salad and we leave stuffed! Of course with a dozen cookies for when we get home!

name: patricia fuller
text: Very clean, super nice people, Very good food! Would definitely eat there again.

name: Rosemary Marshall
text: Catfish  freshly  cooked  food was good

name: Anthony Cornelius
text: Great food, but this location has a habit of getting my order wrong or forgetting to include all of the items. Update: unlike most places at least someone responded to my post. Thumbs up for that at least they care. You get one more star for that.👍

resp.text: Hi Anthony, thank you for your feedback. Please feel free to contact our marketing director at erin@fullmoonbbq.com to discuss your experience.

name: Shaun Henry
text: Great food!

name: Tim Greene
text: Great visit, great food

name: Jennifer Combs Minyard
text: The food is always good and the staff super friendly!

name: Sharon Bullard
text: I had an awesome experience at full moon in Fultondale this evening. When the young man Rodrick saw me having trouble getting up from the chair he offered (and did) carry my food to the car for me.  Also, the person who waited on me at the he register was extremely nice and professional.  Thanks to everyone, including those working behind the scenes this evening.  I will be going back in the future.

resp.text: We are so happy with your experience, Sharon! All of our employees work so hard, and it is great to hear feedback from our happy customers!

name: Cathy McCOrd-Baugh
text: The ribs were tough

resp.text: Hi Cathy, thank you for your feedback. Please feel free to contact our marketing coordinator at erin@fullmoonbbq.com to discuss your experience further. We want to hear from you!

name: Bethany Calloway
text:
Terrible service. Slow. When I ask if she put bbq sauce in bag my she rolled her eyes.
Don’t waist your money or time here.

resp.text: Hi Bethany, thank you for your feedback. Please feel free to contact our marketing coordinator at emory@fullmoonbbq.com to discuss your experience. We want to hear from you!

name: Miss Behave
text: I just absolutely L❤VE Full Moon  BBQ in general and this location in particular. They never get my order wrong. Food is always tasty.  Often a wait but worth it.

name: Big D's Shade Tree
text: We had a pork plate and a turkey salad. Everything was great. Service was even better!

name: Sandra Moore
text: They make sure that you get your money's worth.....and it taste great!

name: Hunter Roberts
text: This place sucks. Everytime I order my BBQ sandwich with no pickles but they're always on there. To many times already. Sorry not coming back ever again!

resp.text: Hi Hunter, thank you for your feedback. Please feel free to contact our marketing coordinator at kylie@fullmoonbbq.com to discuss your experience. We want to hear from you!

name: Camillia Harrison
text: Love their stuffed pork potatoes. Service was great also.  Wish Cullman had one.🙂❤

name: michelle stanley
text: Very unorganized, slow. And rude teenagers

resp.text: Hello Michelle, thank you for your feedback. Please feel free to contact our marketing coordinator at emory@fullmoonbbq.com to discuss your experience further. We want to hear from you!

name: Tera
text: We got the pulled pork with okra and corn and ribs with mac and cheese and potato salad. Meat was dry. Corn was over cooked and even the cornbread was dry. Mac n cheese and okra was good. And their sauce is actually good.

resp.text: Hi, Tera. While we're happy to hear you enjoyed some of your meal, complete customer satisfaction is our #1 priority. Can you please provide your contact information to fullmoonsocialmedia@gmail.com? Our manager would like to speak with you directly.

name: Mamie Cherry
text: I always get the regular bbq sandwich with plain Lay's. Delicious every time I go!

name: Bobby Franklin
text: Food is always awesome! And service was pretty good; in and out in a minute.

name: Sabrina Cunningham
text: I was visiting my family in Alabama and decided to purchase some food from Full Moon Bar-b-Que . The food there was horrible. The chicken wings was spoiled and the ribs tasted like lighter fluid. The mac and cheese was soupy also the greens had no flavor. this was the worse food ever.

name: Keith J
text: They put a gigantic amount of pulled pork on my sandwich which I appreciated. But it was hard to keep meat from falling out while eating and driving. There wasn't much sauce, onion and slaw-relish or whatever else it is that they put on it though. What they did put on there was slapped on one side of the sandwich and half of that ended up in the wrap. Altogether it was a dry and sloppy sandwich.

name: XxdragonlordxX l
text: Good barbecue and nachos!!!

name: Sheila Merchant
text: Loved the food. The wait was long but they gave me some cookies to ease the pain. It was well worth it 😊

name: Deanmu6uio Paulin
text:
Great food! Best to come a little early or late.
Usually a big crowd. Very well run and good prices. Loaded menu!

resp.text: Thanks for the love! We hope to see you again soon!

name: John Seed
text: I’ve been here so many times that they basically know my whole family. I’ve tried everything, from the catfish, to wings, to BBQ, to a Caesar Salad, and I can tell you, it’s all worth ordering again, and again, and again, and so on. The service is very quick, and the people are very kind to boot. If you haven’t tried this, you’ve wasted your life.

name: Zavier De'Sine
text: Not a fan of the sauce but the food is really good. I am pretty sure the Jolly Green Giant grows their Big Baker 🥔. It's about the size of a 10 year olds head. Plus their ribs are fall off the bone good, and then they make their own sausages that are insanely good.

name: Joel Rhaly
text: Food was very good. Get there early because it seems everyone may share my opinion because the dining area was packed. Standing room only.

name: Martin Jackson
text: Ribs fell off the bone, the bake beans so good I went back for more. OMG the pie is to die for.

name: Rebecca Moss
text: The baker, a HUGE baked potato is fantastic when you put the Angus beef on top of it.  It made 3 meals for me. Also,  I love their ice!

name: Napoleon Posadas
text: This is a an ALL 5 STAR REVIEW...   This is Truly The BEST BBQ Place I’ve been to... Had the Chicken n Rib Plate with trimmings.  I recommend this Place and don’t forget to come on an Empty Stomach...This is Napster and I APPROVE OF THIS MESSAGE... Keep On Truckin’!!!

resp.text: Hi Napolean, we're so glad to hear that! Be sure to try our bakers, burgers, and award-winning desserts next time you come!

name: Kmberlee Mercer
text: The center cut ribs are delicious, I love there slaw, bake bean ,and the squash casserole is good, the cat fish one of my favorite

name: Jon Booke
text:
Consistently good food and friendly atmosphere, but always feel rushed going through the order line which can be unpleasant. Also often out of warm barbecue sauce bottles during lunchtime and have seen the same happen at dinner time. Why don’t you either keep them replenished or have more bottles put out at the beginning? Also, why is the wall menu so hidden on the back wall? — we really can’t see the menu well until we get to the counter then we feel rushed. Keep up the good work overall, but you have room for improvement.

UPDATE:
I am updating my review because this location now has more warm barbecue sauce available because it looks like that put in another pot for them.

It’s probably too much to think that the wall menu will be fixed, probably too much expense.

name: kelly watts
text: Have usually enjoyed Blue Moon,  have been excited they are coming to Hville. Was in the Gardendale location today while in town briefly and was disappointed.  Was staffed almost entirely by very young folk. Food was served cold to myself And other customers nearby, wrong sides served to wrong customers and we were told quite impatiently to figure it out and trade around. The sweet tea ran out, by that point I wasn't surprised the kids running the joint didn't offer to get us some from the kitchen. And I think they used the food processor to chop the meat, it was minced to the point of no texture.

name: Marci Shemaria
text: We just love this bbq, we stop whenever we are nearby

name: Jeanna Fredericksen
text: Group of 14 hungry travelers were all pleased. Delicious food, huge portions,  friendly and fast service. Dedicated fryers fir the fries so gluten free is an option. Thanks for a great experience

name: Donna Evans
text: Last week "carried out" pork salads- meat soggy. So, this week "carried out" pork plate, sandwich and onion rings. Took a couple bites, looking for sauce cups, there was not even ONE! Had to wrap and save for later 'till we can go get sauce. I even requested sauce, check 93, 28 Dec.

name: Ann McAnnally
text: I love Full Moon. The only complaint is the drive thru took forever.  Very courteous employees.

name: Kelvin Harris
text: I enjoy the service. They were all excellence people and very professional. I will come again.

name: tiffany benefield
text: The best BBQ in the state of Alabama hands down.

resp.text: Hi Tiffany! Thank you for your feedback. We look forward to serving you again soon!

name: Preston Edmonds
text: This place has great BBQ.

name: Ed Faser
text: Good food, dining room open.

name: Marta Reaves
text: Quick service

name: robin belk
text: Very delicious hamburgers and onion rings!

name: Drew C.
text: Nothing much to complain about. Good pulled pork.  Good ribs.  Fried green tomatoes were well seasoned but a little soggy. Drumsticks were a little dry.

resp.text: Hi Andrew, thanks for the feedback. We're glad you had a good experience and hope to see you again soon!

name: Joe Conn
text: Great bbq

name: Cool Beans
text: I experienced racism at the drive thru today. The two cashiers, 1 african american and 1 caucasian, saw that i was Hispanic and they joked "No Speak English." When the african American saw that I heard it he tried to change the topic and said "I only speak black." To add insult to injury....i ordered a HALF CHICKEN, i specifically asked for the thigh and leg. Well.... upon arriving home I open it and there were 3 wings, two rib parts with some breast, a spine, and some disgusting looking gut thing! WHAT KIND OF CHICKEN HAS 3 WINGS?! Also my chow chow was leaked, and my pickles too...i had pickle juice everywhere! The store is closed right now, but im returning it first thing in the morning! And if the manager doesn't do right by me and my family (because they didn't eat dinner), i will cal corporate offices and filing a complaint with the BBB. Just because I look different doesn't mean i don't deserve 1st Class service. And I'm taking this very seriously because i want other Hispanics to be treated equally.

text: No one here will wear a mask during the middle of a virus outbreak. I asked the manager if their employees would wear a mask and she said no. Then the employees said they didn't have to because they didn't think the disease was a big deal.

name: Tina Wallace
text: I give this subway a 1 because of their lack of care for the health of their customers.  In the mist of the COVID-19 pandemic this subway does not require employees to wear mask for food prep or making sandwiches.   The employee told me that he doesn’t wear a mask so I asked for someone who wears a mask to make my sandwich.  Which they did. But this same unmasked employee was prepping food in the back.  I don’t understand how this is ok.

text: Excellent costumer service and great food. We literally just left this Subway and it's by far the best one I've been to. Both guys that were working were polite, quick, and got the order correct. One of the guys even twirled the condiment bottles as he was putting them on my sandwich, very talented. If we lived closer, this would be my Subway of choice. We got 3 pizzas and 3 subs, the food was hot and fresh.

name: Mickey Berry
text: I’m normally not a Subway fan. Well, I don’t mean that I’m not a subway fan, but what I mean is, it’s not top of mind when I’m thinking of a restaurant or somewhere quick to eat.  Every time I’m at this location though, I always enjoy the food and the customer service is always great. Antonio greeted us and took care of us and made us feel at home. I got the steak and cheese sub, chips, and a drink, and my wife got sliders. The bread was not fantastic on the sliders but overall it was a great experience for fast food. This location is super convenient to my office and our house. I’ll be back!

My boyfriend's was heated but when he got an all meat no veggie or cheese sandwich it was served cold and they had to reheat it after we got it. Mine I kept having to ask him to put more than 3 pieces of each vegetable I asked him to put on it. And he didn't even put any sweet onion sauce on it and it was so dry. I was just so disappointed by this subway. We will find another one to visit in the future.
